item.title: Brand Recommendations - TF-IDF
item.description: I started learning about Machine Learning with a couple online courses. The thing with these courses is that I got to learn a lot of cool stuff supported with step-by-step tutorials, but I never took some time to actually build something on my own, that tackles a real issue that I’m facing. This is where things get interesting. One of the initiatives that I had at the company I was working back then was around brand recommendations.
